Please, I know this sounds stupid here, But if you like this game PLEASE buy it.

It is a great game done by a VERY small company. They REALLY need all the help they can get. This is a truly unique and innovative new type of game that deserves to be supported. So PLEASE if you do like it help these guys out and buy a copy. 

This is one company that truly believes in making good games that are for gamers, not console retards. Help them out or before you know it we wont have good devs like these anymore!

Armagedon the guy that developed this game is a lying theiving son of bitch. The guy has litterally commited fraud on a massive scale against the people that payed for its development through the Beta. I know this for a fact as i'm one of the people that payed for its development (over 4 years ago) and have followed its development very carefully. 

So unless you're desperate to play online (another thing he lied about as he said there would be no online play) i encourage you all to not give this thieving turkish twat a penny of your money.

This torrent does work online for now.  Not sure when this will be 'fixed', but you can play it just fine on the dedicated servers at this time.

On a side note, people that paid for the original game, this isn't worth shelling out $30 for.  Better to pirate it and let it be.  Had the developer given a $10 option or so to upgrade the original game into this I would have considered it, but I say just pirate it.  If you own neither, I recommend supporting the developer eventually if you like this of course :).
